dialogue_metadata.inferred_vibe: Cynical and critical discussion of a news event

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Ugh, you are not gonna believe this. Just, like, ugh. Oh, the Almaty avalanche? Yeah, pretty grim. Skier killed. Killed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ugh, you are not gonna believe this. Just, like, ugh. Oh, the Almaty avalanche? Yeah, pretty grim. Skier killed. Killed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A skier was killed in an avalanche in the Almaty mountains.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Or, like, contributed to their own demise? It was in a prohibited area, wasn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or, like, contributed to their own demise? It was in a prohibited area, wasn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Three skiers were skiing in a prohibited area.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, apparently near Komsomol Peak, at the Shymbulak resort. Three skiers, I guess, they were freeriding.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, apparently near Komsomol Peak, at the Shymbulak resort. Three skiers, I guess, they were freeriding.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On March 17, the 112 Almaty Emergency Situations Department received a message from the dispatcher of the Shymbulak ski resort about an avalanche in the area of Komsomol Peak, located one kilometer from the resort. ... Three freeriders cut the slope while skiing, causing a snow slide.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: "Freeriding." So, that's what we're calling just, uh, ignoring all the rules now? Cutting a slope?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Freeriding. So, that's what we're calling just, uh, ignoring all the rules now? Cutting a slope?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the emergency department had explicitly warned people. Like, storm warnings, SMS, media, everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the emergency department had explicitly warned people. Like, storm warnings, S M S, media, everything.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Department of Emergency Situations had previously warned citizens about the threat of avalanches based on a storm warning issued by the Kazhydromet State Enterprise. The information was disseminated via SMS and the media.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: An SMS! That's their big defense? Oh, great. That's, like, definitely going to stop someone determined to, you know, ignore all the barriers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: An S M S! That's their big defense? Oh, great. That's, like, definitely going to stop someone determined to, you know, ignore all the barriers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Two of them got out on their own. But the third, a 34-year-old Russian citizen, was pulled out. No signs of life, they said.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Two of them got out on their own. But the third, a thirty four-year-old Russian citizen, was pulled out. No signs of life, they said.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Two of the victims were able to get out on their own, and the third person, who had no signs of life, was pulled out from under the snow by Shymbulak rescuers. ... According to the Ministry of Emergency Situations, the deceased was a 34-year-old Russian citizen.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: No signs of life. Hmm. Was it even a big avalanche? Or, like, did they just wait too long?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No signs of life. Hmm. Was it even a big avalanche? Or, like, did they just wait too long?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: The report says about 50 cubic meters of snow. And it was, uh, a woman's body eventually pulled out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The report says about fifty cubic meters of snow. And it was, uh, a woman's body eventually pulled out.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Later, the Department of Emergency Situations added that the volume of the snow avalanche was about 50 cubic meters. A woman's body was pulled out from under the rubble.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Fifty cubic meters. Okay. So, a woman, in a prohibited zone, after warnings. What did she expect to happen, honestly?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fifty cubic meters. Okay. So, a woman, in a prohibited zone, after warnings. What did she expect to happen, honestly?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: And this isn't even the first time. Skiers triggered one there before, too. Just ignored the safety warnings and barriers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And this isn't even the first time. Skiers triggered one there before, too. Just ignored the safety warnings and barriers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, skiers triggered an avalanche at Shymbulak. According to officials, three skiers ignored safety warnings, crossed protective barriers, and ventured into a hazardous area, causing a mass of snow to slide.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Unbelievable. Just utterly, completely unbelievable. You warn people, they ignore it, then tragedy strikes. Whose fault is that, really?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unbelievable. Just utterly, completely unbelievable. You warn people, they ignore it, then tragedy strikes. Whose fault is that, really?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I mean, the article does say they crossed protective barriers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I mean, the article does say they crossed protective barriers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to officials, three skiers ignored safety warnings, crossed protective barriers, and ventured into a hazardous area, causing a mass of snow to slide.
